key_themes: Monetary easing tailwinds and rate-cut expectations
AI sector leadership and infrastructure investment momentum
Commodity and crypto recovery sustainability testing
Software/fintech earnings headwinds vs. AI strength bifurcation
Technical exhaustion in key assets (silver, equity momentum) vs. macro optimism
risk_factors: Silver and risk-asset exhaustion signals triggering sharp pullback confirmation
Earnings disappointment in enterprise software and fintech materializing
Geopolitical escalation (Taiwan, Russia-Ukraine) creating volatility spikes
Momentum deterioration breadth (116 vs. 150+ expected healthy names) confirming weakness
Year-end options expiration dynamics and dealer hedging reversals reshaping support/resistance
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Watch $700 call wall (active resistance), $670 support (active hedging). QQQ: Test $625-$630 resistance zone (both active), support $590 if approached. Expect consolidation near max pain ($686 SPY, $621 QQQ) with dealer hedging limiting directional moves.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: $700 call wall breakout target if momentum confirms, $640 put wall as swing-low support (5-7% downside buffer). QQQ: $630-$640 resistance zone to clear for continuation, $585-$590 support for pullback scenarios. Max pain gravitational pull ($686/$621) acts as short-term ceiling through year-end.
